long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DynaSource is the ultimate recruitment productivity tool for recruiters using Jobvite as their Application Tracking System. With a click, you can send candidate information from many popular social networking sites directly to your ATS. The painful and frustrating process of copying and pasting candidate info now just takes seconds. Shave hours off your sourcing time and start getting more hires, faster.
